columnB: The master of the followers who devastated the sacrifice
The one whose sacrifice was frustrated
The one who was arrested by Maṇimān
The one who was arrested by Caṇḍeśa
The one who was arrested by Nandīśvara
The king who would punish plunderers

answers.Vīrabhadra: Threw the head into the southern side of the sacrificial fire
answers.Lord Śiva: The master of the followers who devastated the sacrifice
answers.Prajāpati Dakṣa: The one whose sacrifice was frustrated
answers.Bhṛgu Muni: The one who was arrested by Maṇimān
answers.Pūṣā: The one who was arrested by Caṇḍeśa
answers.Bhaga: The one who was arrested by Nandīśvara
answers.King Barhi: The king who would punish plunderers

Vīrabhadra.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.26 | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra then took the head and with great anger threw it into the southern side of the sacrificial fire, offering it as an oblation.'

Maṇimān.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested Bhṛgu Muni'

Caṇḍeśa.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Another follower, who was named Caṇḍeśa, arrested Pūṣā'

Nandīśvara.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Nandīśvara arrested the demigod Bhaga'

Lord Śiva.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.13 | QUOTE: 'all the followers of Lord Śiva surrounded the arena of sacrifice'

Prajāpati Dakṣa.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Vīrabhadra, the black demon, arrested Prajāpati Dakṣa'

Bhṛgu Muni.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Maṇimān, one of the followers of Lord Śiva, arrested Bhṛgu Muni'

Pūṣā.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Another follower, who was named Caṇḍeśa, arrested Pūṣā'

Bhaga.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.17 | QUOTE: 'Nandīśvara arrested the demigod Bhaga'

King Barhi.reference: SOURCE: SB 4.5.8 | QUOTE: 'Where is this dust storm blowing from? Is the dissolution of the planet now to occur? ... there is still the strong King Barhi, who would punish them.'
